attributes.action: US vetoes over Israeli issues at the United Nations
attributes.additional_details:
That this Government instructs its representative at the United Nations not to blindly follow the lead of the USA regarding voting on Palestinian repression, for the following reasons.
The Human Rights Council has passed more resolutions condemning Israel than it has all other states combined. The United Nations General Assembly has adopted a number of resolutions saying that the strategic relationship with the United States encourages Israel to pursue aggressive and expansionist policies and practices.
